description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[A History of Greece, from the earliest times to the destruction of Corinth, B.C. 146, mainly based upon that of Connop Thirlwall, etc.]" Author: SCHMITZ, Leonhard. Contributor: SCHARF, George - Sir, K.C.B Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 1305.e.7." Page: 109 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1856 Edition: Fourth edition, with supplementary chapters on literature and the arts [by C. K. Watson]. Illustrated with numerous woodcuts by G. Scharf, jun. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003287205 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
